column4: RED:draw two if you chose the RED action
BLUE:+2 Cards if you choose the BLUE Action
YELLOW:-1 card from COMPOST then +2 cards to hand
BLUE:+2 Trunk if you choose the BLUE action
YELLOW:+2 SOIL if you choose the YELLOW action
+1 COMPOST then +3 SPROUTS if you choose the YELLOW action
BLUE:+1 COMPOST from hand then +1 SPROUTS
RED:+2 SOIL if you chose the RED action
RED:+2 TRUNKS if you choose the RED action
RED:+1 SPROUTS BLUE:-1 SPROUTS then +3 COMPOST
